name: Risky Rocket
description:
Risky Rocket is a pixelated platformer where you make use of your unlimited supply of rockets to bounce from surface to surface, and through the air, towards your goal.

This project is still a work-in-progress, so any feedback is appreciated!

If you wish to access test builds and further discuss the project, feel free to join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/sfM7mXA
